greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers n such that n^2 + (n+1)^2 is a semiprime.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65536
maple: a:= proc(n) local k; for k from 1+`if`(n=1, 0, a(n-1))
results.author: _Jason Earls_, Jun 25 2005
